definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
garlic chives (Allium tuberosum), aka Chinese chives/(fig.) retail investors who lose their money to more experienced operators (i.e. they are "harvested" like garlic chives)

sentences.english: Eat leeks in march, and garlic in May and all the year after physicians may play.
sentences.chinese: 三月喫韭，五月喫蒜，醫生可成年悠閒自在。

sentences.english: The present paper reports the chromosome numbers and karyotypes of 4 populations of Allium pratt ii in Sect.
sentences.chinese: 研究了蔥屬太白韭青海4個居羣的染色體數目和核型。

sentences.english: There are differences in colonization rates between different sites, ranged from 8.
sentences.chinese: 不同地區採集的蒙古韭菌根侵染率不同，由8。

sentences.english: The results indicated that the store temperature is the most important influence factor of the product quality.
sentences.chinese: 貯藏溫度是影響鹿耳韭貯藏品質的關鍵因素。

sentences.english: The Welsh are all excellent singers, and eat leeks all the time.
sentences.chinese: 威爾士人全部是優秀的歌手，並且一直喫韭。

definition: celery wormwood (Artemisia carvifolia)/to give off/to weed
phonetic character used in loanwords for the sound "jia", although 夹 is more common

Manchurian wild rice (Zizania latifolia), now rare in the wild, formerly harvested for its grain, now mainly cultivated for its edible stem known as 茭白筍[jiao1 bai2 sun3], which is swollen by a smut fungus/(variant of 菇[gu1]) mushroom
